message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1350000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know it's worth $1200000 to you, and I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1100000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $1250000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product for both of us. I'm open to discussing further, but I won't go any lower.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1225000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to discussing further if you're willing to meet me at this price.

Bob, I'm glad we're getting closer.  $1225000 is still a bit below my minimum, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we split the difference and go with $1237500? I'm confident this price is fair to both of us, considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering $1225000, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
